events.name: Throwback Thursday with Night Awl
events.description: Featuring deep cuts, party anthems and remixes nostalgic songs from two of the best decades of music with the very best music from the 80's and 90's

events.name: Boom Festival
events.description: It's looking more and more like we will be seeing events return in the summer! To celebrate this we are returning with the classic Boom festival.

events.name: Encore Night Boat Party
events.address: 675 Water St New York, New York
events.description: Who is ready to party? I mean in the middle of the water, a boat with good music and drinks. If thats you then you made it to the right place.

events.name: Jam Concert Live

events.description: No Sleep Till Brooklyn... It's the Beastie Boys
